name: Ramadan Calendar
description:
Ramadan Mubarak =D

This is a Ramadan Calendar, 

InshaAllah one lantern will start to sparkle for each day of Ramadan. 


Click in the window to start.
Use mouse to look around, arrows to move.
Look for sparkling lantern.
Click to "open" a lantern.
If you get lost - press space.

 


  • Lantern 1: Ayat 2:21-22, audio: Mishari Rashid al-Afasy 
  • Lantern 2: Ayah 2:164, audio: Mishari Rashid al-Afasy 
  • Lantern 3: Ayah 2:255, audio: Mishari Rashid al-Afasy 
  • Lantern 4: Ayah 3:185, audio: Mishari Rashid al-Afasy
